main event: Several civilian witnesses reported seeing bright, round objects with flashing lights in the sky over Guilford, Ohio on September 18, 1952.
interesting points: The objects were described as two to three bright round lights, red, green and blue in color, that flashed off and on.
The objects appeared and disappeared very shortly, and originated in the southern sky before descending vertically.
The sighting lasted for around 10 minutes, with the bright light flashing for 20 seconds.
Multiple civilian sightings of similar objects were reported in the Elyria, Ohio area around the same time.
One sighting described a bright light seen on the ground by two witnesses, covering an area of about 11 acres before vanishing abruptly after about two minutes.
sighted object: Two to three bright round lights, red, green and blue in color, flashing on and off
